SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date , COUNT(*) AS count ,SUM(order_total_price) AS totalMoney FROM `order` WHERE (order_status=2 OR order_status=3) AND DATE(create_time)>=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY date ORDER BY date;
